name: FilmDex
description: Interactive index for physical movies (DVD, Blu-ray, 4K UHD).
author: Renault John Lecoultre

scripts.dev:backend: nodemon --watch backend/src --watch backend/index.js --watch data --watch deployment.dev.json --delay 2 --exec "node dev-backend.js"
scripts.docker:build: DOCKER_BUILD=1 cd dist && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t filmdex:latest --load .
scripts.docker:build:ghcr: DOCKER_BUILD=1 cd dist && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t ghcr.io/renajohn/filmdex:latest -t ghcr.io/renajohn/filmdex:$(npm run version --silent) --push .
scripts.docker:run: cd dist && docker run -p 3001:3001 -v $(pwd)/../data:/data $(if [ -f ../.env ]; then echo '--env-file ../.env'; fi) $(if [ ! -z "$TMDB_API_KEY" ]; then echo '-e TMDB_API_KEY="$TMDB_API_KEY"'; fi) $(if [ ! -z "$OMDB_API_KEY" ]; then echo '-e OMDB_API_KEY="$OMDB_API_KEY"'; fi) filmdex:latest
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
